Interface ec.plubar.jiSetFacetRecouper

interface jiSetFacetRecouper
Interface implemented by classes that will allow the capability group to set their facet recoupers, in particular applied to whatever we end up calling the unumrouter/deflector for.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Arturo Bejar

This class is not public and therefore cannot be used outside this package.
